void eol_armature_free (eolArmature **arm)
 returns the armature information to the system. It will only be freed from memory when it is no longer needed. For safety, it sets the pointer passed to NULL.
void eol_armature_cleanup ()
 delete any unreferenced but allocated armature data. This will be needed to run between levels and on demand.

void eol_armature_deform_mesh ( eolArmature *  arm,
eolMesh *  mesh,
eolUint  frame 
)

deforms the drawing vertices of the model based on the bone pose for the specified frame

Parameters:
arm the armature to use for deforming
mesh the mesh to deform
frame which frame to deform for. Note that if the frame it outside the range of frames for arm, no change will occur.

Definition at line 857 of file eol_armature.c.

void eol_armature_free ( eolArmature **  arm  ) 

returns the armature information to the system. It will only be freed from memory when it is no longer needed. For safety, it sets the pointer passed to NULL.

Parameters:
arm a pointer to the armature pointer that will be returned. Your pointer will be set to NULL when done.
